name: River Bouncing
description:
In a beautiful river, a group of mini box-guys want to cross the river with the trampoline. And you as the trampoline operator, need to move it beneath them and help them cross the river successfully! Please be careful, and do not let anyone of them fall into the river, otherwise you are failed! Good luck!

How to play:
- click and drag on the screen to move the trampoline
